summary: On New Year's Eve, a bourgeoisie group of hunters finds the frozen body of a long dead WWII partisan fighter. They spend the night debating what to do with it, which reveals their sins from the war and leads to their symbolic punishment.
cast: Vangelis Kazan|Eva Kotamanidou|Giorgos Danis|Mairi Hronopoulou|Ilias Stamatiou|Betty Valassi|Aliki Georgouli|Nikos Kouros|Stratos Pahis|Dimitris Kaberidis|Christoforos Nezer|Takis Doukakos|Rafael Denogias|Giorgos Frantzeskakis|Thanos Grammenos|Loukas Hrelias|Dimitris Ioakeimidis|Stelios Lionakis|Sofia Seirli|Sofia Sfyroera|Vasilis Tsaglos|Giorgos Tsigos|Giorgos Tzifos|Nikos Verlekis|Kostas Stefanakis
keywords: year 1976|actress|left versus right|post war|greek civil war
title: Los cazadores
